snippet: An adaptive trait in a complicated century: the ability to fall forward without falling down.
abstract: An adaptive trait in a complicated century: the ability to fall forward without falling down.
lead_paragraph: Here's a Twittter post for a new year in a century in which the things we don't know are easily as important as those we do. In such an environment, what qualities can help individuals and communities avoid big missteps? I'd start with literacy, connectedness, empathy, engagement, enterprise and anthropophilia.
